mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_PASSWD_VERIFI(V_NAME, V_LABEL, V_DESC, V_RULES, V_REQUIRED, V_STATUS) VALUES (#{name}, #{label}, #{desc}, #{rules}, #{required}, '1')
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_PASSWD_VERIFI t SET V_NAME = #{name}, V_LABEL = #{label}, V_DESC = #{desc}, V_RULES = #{rules}, V_REQUIRED = #{required}, V_STATUS = #{status} WHERE t.V_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.V_ID, t.V_NAME, t.V_LABEL, t.V_DESC, t.V_RULES, t.V_REQUIRED, t.V_STATUS FROM SYS_PASSWD_VERIFI t WHERE t.V_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY t.V_NAME ASC
